Hey all, I reached out to some folks internally based on your responses to see if someone has more context on the PBE and can answer your questions and concerns a bit better. Stay tuned!

Let me jump in here and provide some further details about the PBE approval process. Our team is primarily responsible for approving accounts going into the PBE, so I can speak to how we determine who gets through. 

The history of approvals had been on a need basis. If there was testing needed around a core feature or game mode, we'd look for more PBE players. For example, if a game mode was trying to cater to Silver and below, the team would approve accounts that met that criteria.

In the recent months, we've been seeing a need for more PBE players in general and have attempted to approve applicants in waves anywhere from 2-4 weeks. If your LIVE account is in good standing over the last 6 months, there is a good chance for approval. That being said, there still remains a deep pool of applicants. 

Moreover, recently, our team discovered a bug with the script identifying who to approve. Now that we know of the issue, we hope to resolve it soon and continue the approval waves.

I hope that helps clear up some confusion.
